description:
A high capacity bag with an integrated tarp to keeps your rope and gear out of the dirt. The tarp also controls the rope while you scooch it back into the bag. Padded strap carries comfortably over the shoulder or easily attaches to packs.

  • Made of ballistic nylon with dual compression straps
  • Plastic window lets you see which rope is in the bag
  • Unbreakable buckles withstand abuse
  • Drawcord closure eliminates grommet failure
  • Big tarp with tie-down points has space for stacking 60 and 70m ropes
name: Metolius Ropemaster HC Rope Bag
